resources.string: It\'s likely that the background check failed due to a temporary network connectivity issue. But if this error occurs more than once a week, please report it. Click to view the error log.
Due to an unknown bug the background check failed. Please report this error. Click to view the error log.

Privately browse the internet, for free! The Brave Private Browser App is your fast, free, and safe private web browser with ad blocker and pop-up blocker. Privately browse and search the internet without being tracked by advertisers, malware and pop-ups.
Brave uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Brave?

Bromite aims at providing a no-clutter browsing experience without privacy-invasive features and with the addition of a fast ad-blocking engine. Minimal UI changes are applied to help curbing the idea of "browser as an advertisement platform".
Brave uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Brave?
The application requires Android %1$s. But your device is only running Android %2$s. Either choose a different app, update your operating system or switch to a newer smartphone.
Show errors of the background update checker

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you’ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.
This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser. Do you want to install it?
This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.

This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy. \n\nFirefox Klar is developed for Germany, Switzerland and Austria and is almost identical to Firefox Focus. Only the name was changed to avoid confusion with the news magazine \'Focus\' from the \'Hubert Burda Media\' media group.

Please note that this app used to be titled Firefox Preview. It has now been transitioned to Firefox Nightly. 

Firefox Nightly is a developmental channel for new Mozilla Firefox releases. 

Firefox Nightly is designed to showcase the more experimental builds of Firefox. The Nightly channel allows users to experience the newest Firefox innovations in an unstable environment and provide feedback on features and performance to help determine what makes the final release.
This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser. Do you want to install it?

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you’ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.

Definitely not brought to you by Mozilla! 

Iceraven Browser is a web browser for Android, based on Mozilla's Fenix version of Firefox, GeckoView and Mozilla Android Components. 

Our goal is to be a close fork of the new Firefox for Android that seeks to provide users with more options, more opportunities to customize (including a broad extension library), and more information about the pages they visit and how their browsers are interacting with those pages.

This is an updater for multiple browsers from Mozilla. Click the plus-button for installation and the down-arrow-button for updating. You can check for new updates by down-swiping or reopening the app. By default the app will check regularly for updates in the background. I did my best to secure the installation/updating process - feel free to double-check it or improve it by creating a pull-request. \n\nLast successful background update check: %1$s
The system download app is disabled. FFUpdater needs this app for downloading. Please enable it.
External storage is not available - can\'t start download. Current status is:

Either an attacker has replaced the correct download with a tampered one or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.

Either a tampered application has been installed or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug. \n\nI recommend you to uninstall the application.
On your device is only %1$d MB of space available. This may lead to download or installation failure.
You have to uninstall the existing app before FFUpdater can install or update the app. Backup your data because the uninstall will delete all your bookmarks, settings etc.

Reason: The current installed app is not signed by the original developer - maybe it\'s signed by F-Droid. Android refuses to update an app if different people signed the installed and the updated version.
You can now close this window
The latest version of this app is already installed. Do you want to download and install the latest version again?

Kiwi is based on Chromium. Easily switch to Kiwi without having to painstakingly learn a new interface or break your existing browsing habits. \n\nAmong other functionalities, Kiwi Browser supports: Night Mode (another implementation than Chromium), Support for Chrome Extensions, Bottom address bar It also includes performance improvements (partial rasterization of tiles, etc).
Kiwi uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Kiwi?
PASSWORD ACCESS FOR YOU, & ONLY YOU \n\nSecurely track your Firefox passwords & access them anywhere. Quickly open any website from the app to get into your accounts

Unfortunately, %1$s has crashed. You can report this error on:
 - notabug.org: https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater/issues
 - GitHub: https://github.com/Tobi823/ffupdater/issues
 - GitLab: https://gitlab.com/Tobiwan/ffupdater_gitlab/-/issues 

Please create a new issue with the stacktrace and a description on how to reproduce the bug.
How often should the app check for updates?
Only installed apps will be automatically checked for updates. You can remove installed apps from the automatic update check by selecting them here.

If this option is disabled, FFUpdater can use your mobile internet to check for app updates in the background. This will reduce your monthly data limit. When this option is enabled, only unmetered network connections, like the majority of WiFis, are used for background update checking.
Choose between light and dark theme
The selected browser is incompatible with your smartphone\'s processor. Please select a different browser.
